entry.title: A Race For The Soul
entry.summary: Short film on the 2001 Western States. A very refreshing look into the middle/back-of-the-pack runners.
entry.content: Short film on the 2001 Western States. A very refreshing look into the middle/back-of-the-pack runners.

entry.title: Running Madness
entry.summary: "Vintage" documentary on Western States 100. Focuses on "average joes", and features a very young, long haired Scott Jurek. Great stuff.
entry.content: "Vintage" documentary on Western States 100. Focuses on "average joes", and features a very young, long haired Scott Jurek. Great stuff.

entry.title: The Great American Foot Race
entry.summary: Facing scorching temperatures, 19-year-old Andy Payne, a small-town Cherokee boy, takes home the gold after winning a grueling 3,422-mile foot race...
entry.content: Facing scorching temperatures, 19-year-old Andy Payne, a small-town Cherokee boy, takes home the gold after winning a grueling 3,422-mile foot race designed to bring attention to the newly constructed Route 66 Highway.

entry.title: Yannis Kouros - Forever running
entry.summary: Greek film on the ultra-running legend.
